messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 28mm Samurai Army (126 miniatures)
messages.msgSnippet: I ve played WAB before... it is pretty fun, but the problem i have is the cost of the figurines, im out of cash ________________________________ From: Takezo
messages.messageBody:
I've played WAB before... it is pretty fun, but the problem i have is the cost of the figurines, im out of cash




________________________________
From: Takezo Getsu <getsutakezo@...>
To: samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thu, October 22, 2009 10:47:06 PM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 28mm Samurai Army (126 miniatures)

 
I did some research, and WAB is Warhammer Ancient Battles, a tabletop game.  Looks fun.  If you look up their website, they have rule books with special rules for samurai armies.

--- On Thu, 10/22/09, Leroy Eaton <zora514@yahoo. com> wrote:

From: Leroy Eaton <zora514@yahoo. com>
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 28mm Samurai Army (126 miniatures)
To: samuraihistory@ yahoogroups. com
Date: Thursday, October 22, 2009, 5:55 PM

 

Yeah, is it for heroscape, Chess, or wat?

____________ _________ _________ __
From: Takezo Getsu <getsutakezo@ yahoo.com>
To: samuraihistory@ yahoogroups. com
Sent: Wed, October 21, 2009 7:40:39 PM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 28mm Samurai Army (126 miniatures)

Sorry to bother you, but what game are they for?

--- On Tue, 10/20/09, martinisword9 <martinisword9@ yahoo.com> wrote:

From: martinisword9 <martinisword9@ yahoo.com>
Subject: [samuraihistory] 28mm Samurai Army (126 miniatures)
To: Undisclosed- Recipient@ yahoo.com
Date: Tuesday, October 20, 2009, 9:17 PM

HI

Sorry to clutter your emails but since some of you might be interested:

I have several well painted 28mm Samurai armies going up for sale soon. The figures are individually mounted and each army can have either Takeda or Uesugi sashimonos on each warrior. They are a base line 2500 point WAB army but you can add additional weapons options to bring it up to 3000 points or configure it to play games with fewer points. Contact me off line if you are interested.

1 General
1 Army Standard Bearer
1 Musician
3 Samurai Heroes
2 Samurai Cavalry units (6 each) (or 1 unit of 12)
2 Samurai Infantry units (15 each)
4 Ashigaru units (20 each)

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

____________ _________ _________ _________ _________ __
